title: Boost Your Productivity with the best Microsoft's .NET Application Blocks (Configuration & Exception Block)
sessionTitle: Boost Your Productivity with the best Microsoft's .NET Application Blocks (Configuration & Exception Block)
eventShortDescription: ​All developers need exception management and all developers need to store settings. Microsoft has built these two code sets called: Application Blocks to address these tasks. They are ready to use but are missing some important functionality. Come see how they have been extended, ready for you to insert them straight into your applications.​
